pdfAnnotations.sentence: A Rocky Quarter for Apple and the Road Ahead Last quarter, Apple reported revenues 8% below analysts’ forecasts and endured a wave of user complaints over delayed software features—an unmistakably negative turn for the tech giant.
Beyond that stumble, one clear challenge faces developers: integrating new machine-learning libraries into legacy apps often demands extensive code rewrites.
At the town-hall meeting, the CEO personally thanks every engineer and designer for their hard work, insisting that collective effort will carry them through.
